ActJudges Act (Removal Allowance) Order
SubjectGoodridge, The Hon. William H., RELOCATION EXPENSES
PrecisOrder prescribing additional periods during which certain RELOCATION EXPENSES may be reimbursed to the Hon. WILLIAM H. GOODRIDGE, who was required to relocate to Corner Brook, Newfoundland and Labrador, following his appointment on March 2, 2007 as a Judge of the Trial Division of the Supreme Court of Newfoundland and Labrador.
AttachmentsAttachment
